summary: REQ-7 appears implemented by adding a new "Developer Story" section on the existing Credits page, including the required phrases about Henry English. No immutable frontend paths were modified per the provided diff summary. Some additional Credits page content and metadata files were updated beyond the explicit request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new Credits page sections/content beyond the requested "Developer Story" (e.g., "About This Application" and "Mission" blocks with additional descriptive text).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add a clearly labeled "Developer Story" section while keeping existing Credits requirements intact; it does not request new sections or additional narrative content.
BuildRequest does not request updating project metadata/state files; these changes are not necessary to satisfy REQ-7.
